transcript: I love so that I would give my life for them, and the oth- ers I'd throttle if they stood in my way. I have an adored, a priceless mother, and two or three friends you among them and as for the rest I only care about them in so far as they are harmful or useful. And most of them are harm- ful, especially the women. Yes, dear boy," he continued, "I have met loving, noble, high- minded men, but I have not yet met any wom- encountesses or cooks who were not venal. I have not yet met that divi
